title: Twisted Metal Season 1 Review w/ WWE's Kayla Braxton and Xalavier Nelson
description:
Tim is joined by WWE's Kayla Braxton and Director of El Paso, Elsewhere Xalavier Nelson Jr. to talk all about their thoughts on Twisted Metal Seaosn 1 on Peacock starring Anthony Mackie and Thomas Hayden Church.

Follow Kayla: https://twitter.com/KaylaBraxtonWWE 
Follow Xalavier: https://twitter.com/WritNelson

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:42 - Our History with Twisted Metal
00:06:52 - Our Spoiler-Free Review
00:13:06 - Spoilers, Bro!

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny

Gamescast Background Art by https://twitter.com/Orioto
